message.body: Are you going tomorrow and if you are, what are you dressing as?
Yeah. We're going but I don't know what I'm wearing.
Me neither. I don't know.
I mean. As you know. I don't have costumes or costume- like clothing readily available.

Haha. Yeah, the only thing I'll be able to do is wear a dress....and glitter. Isn't that what Kesha is infamous for? I am going to the mall though. I have to exchange a north face vest, so maybe I can find something there.

Yeah. I'll just be wearing a dress. I think we mentioned doing that and wearing a masquerade mask or something glittery. So if I make it to a store for one I'll let you know and pick you up one of you want.
Oh cool. That sounds good! I'll look around in the mall too, although I'm sure I won't find a cheap one like at party city.
Hey. We were at the party store. I was quicker than I thought I would be and my dad was waiting for us so I couldn't stick around. I'm sorry! I tried to call you.
ahh!! That's okay! I'm sorry i didn't answer. I was getting ready to go to the mall. Did you buy a mask or a costume?
Yeah. I bought a mask. It was thirty dollars though. I wasn't sure if you wanted to spend that much anyway. The only reason I got it was because I can hang it up in my room after since its purple.

Haha. Okay! Yeah, I probably wouldn't have spent $30 but thanks!! I still don't know what to wear. Haha. I have a sequin dress and I can completely gitterize my face but...it's going to rainy all day.
I know. The weather sucks. I think gonna ask uyen if I can get ready there instead of traveling there in heels and a dress.
Ohhhhh. Can you let me know what she says? And if she says yes, can I third wheel with you and Michael?
Yes. Of course.
thank you! Btw, what's Michael wearing?
His antler mask.
Oh okay! Good to see its getting a lot of use.
So uyen said we can get there early. We're thinking about getting there between 7-730.
Okay! Sounds good!
We thought it started at seven but uyen said she's not going to be ready until eight.
Haha. Wow. I like the middle one.
Yeahhhh. Haha. If this isn't an occasion to wear one of these, I don't know what is! I think I'm stuck between the middle one and the all sequin one. It's very Kesha-esque.
Yeah. I like that one but it depends if you want to go sleeveless or not.
Oh I'd wear a jacket!
I picked the middle because of the sleeves but if you think you'll be fine, the last one is more fitting.
Haha. Ok. Then definitely the purple.

Haha. Okay. I'll do that and just throw glitter into my face. I'm coming home from the mall now. I bought some glitter eyeliner from sephora. There were 5 small tubes for $16 so I figured what the heck. Are we walking to uyens?
Yup. Just throw on the glitter. Haha. I'd prefer not to walk in the rain. Perhaps the subway? And Cassy and Jimmy are coming with us.
Okay! Sounds good to me. What time should I meet you?
Michael wants to leave close to seven.
Okay.
Cassy and Jimmy are going to be at my house at 7.
Okay. I might be there a little earlier. I'm leaving in a couple of mins and my dad is dropping me off.
Ok
